DOC.brief_title: Endostar First-line Treatment Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Squamous Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: 1 . Cytological histological confirmation（Do accept single sputum cytology diagnosis patients） patient diagnose lung squamous carcinoma ; 2 . According new IASLC2009 lung cancer TNM stag judge stage IIIB IV nonsmall cell lung cancer . 3 . Must least one evaluated lesion , accord RRECIST version 1.1 standard ( long diameter spiral CT least 10 mm , long diameter plain CT least 20 mm ) ; 4 . Male female , age 18 75 year old ; 5 . ECOG PS 0~1； 6 . Expected survival period ≥ 3 month 7 . Enough blood function : absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) ≥2 x 109 / L platelet count≥ 100 x 109 / L hemoglobin ≥9 g/dL ; 8 . Enough liver function : total bilirubin acuities≤the upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; AST ALT acuities ≤2.5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; Alkaline phosphatase ≤5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; 9 . Enough renal function：serum creatinine ≤the limit normal ( ULN ) calculate creatinine clearance≥60 mL/min . 10 . The electrocardiogram ( ecg ) basicaly normal , body heal wound 11 . No previous antitumor drug therapy , receive non metastatic tumor adjuvant neoadjuvant chemotherapy , end six month study start . 12 . Patients surgery , 4 week study star , patient recover ; 13 . Women cmpleted uterus intact group within 28 day must negative pregnancy test result ( unles amenorrhea 24 month ) . If pregnancy test first time 7 day , patient need urine pregnancy test ( within 7 day first delivery ) . 14 .
